original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
